## Parameter Sweeps

For the per-user random crossfolding data split, we use the first partition of
the fold for parameter tuning.

```{python}
cfg_rmse = rnd_sweep.sql("""
SELECT user_damping, CAST(item_damping AS varchar) AS item_damping, AVG(rmse) AS rmse
FROM run_specs JOIN user_metrics USING (rec_idx)
GROUP BY user_damping, item_damping
""").to_df()
(
    pn.ggplot(cfg_rmse)
    + pn.aes(x='user_damping', y='rmse', color='item_damping', shape='item_damping')
    + pn.geom_line()
    + pn.ylab('Per-user RMSE')
    + pn.scale_color_brewer('qual', 'Dark2')
)
```


```{python}
cfg_ndcg = rnd_sweep.sql("""
SELECT user_damping, CAST(item_damping AS varchar) AS item_damping, AVG(ndcg) AS ndcg
FROM run_specs JOIN user_metrics USING (rec_idx)
GROUP BY user_damping, item_damping
""").to_df()
(
    pn.ggplot(cfg_ndcg)
    + pn.aes(x='user_damping', y='ndcg', color='item_damping', shape='item_damping')
    + pn.geom_line()
    + pn.ylab('Mean nDCG')
    + pn.scale_color_brewer('qual', 'Dark2')
)
```
